name: FIND YOUR WAY OUT (Tejaswini, WhistleWit, OldbearLive, blacksad123)
name_original: FIND YOUR WAY OUT (Tejaswini, WhistleWit, OldbearLive, blacksad123)
description:
GAME OVERVIEW 

This is a 3D game where you build a stable structure(tower) using the object placed in your scene and lead your bouncy ball friend out of the level.

CONTROLS DEVELOPMENT TEAM 

Level Asset Scout: GURPREET SINGH

Game Designer/ SFX: SIDDARTH VIMALA RAVINDREN 

UI Designer/Artist/VFX: SAI PRASHANT REDDY NAREDDY 

Level Designer/Art/ Lighting/ Documentation: TEJASWINI 

Game Programmer/ Designer: CESAR ABRAHAM NAZARIO GARCIA 

DOCUMENTATION
